title: [Purchasing RP] "ERROR: You have encountered an error. Please try again later."
body:
Hello!

Today, I tried to purchase RP with my PayPal account. However, I get this message every time:

> ERROR
> 
> You have encountered an error. Please try again later.

I have closed the client and started it again. Still doesn't work.

replies.body: That specific error can pop up from a variety of different things, but it sounds like their might be some kind of mismatch between payment info somewhere. Hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to look deeper at what's going on. Wouldn't want your personal billing stuff being shared here on the boards!!
